name: Dough Cobble
description:
WARNING - THIS GAME WILL EVENTUALLY CONTAIN SPOILERS FOR PIZZA TOWER. IN THIS ETB STATE OF THE GAME, THERE IS CURRENTLY NOTHING THAT SPOILS PIZZA TOWER. GO BUY AND PLAY THE GAME FIRST BEFORE PLAYING THIS ONE IF YOU WORRY ABOUT SPOILERS.

"There have been many hints of Peppino's longtime rival still being around, looking for a treasure that grants any wish that one desires... A legend that long predated the Pizza Tower itself... And now, only Peppino and his Gang can stop this menace from acquiring something that can destroy the world."

DEFAULT CONTROLS

Left Arrow Key - Left

Right Arrow Key - Right

Z - Attack/Use Powerup Ability

X - Jump

C - Dash

DISCORD SERVER: Click Here!
